== 监控代码性能 ==
{{{class="brush: javascript"
var log = function(msg){
     if(window.console){
            var now = new Date - 0;
            var last = arguments.callee.last;
             if(typeof last === "number"){
               window.console.log(msg +"        :       "+(now-last)+" ms");
            }
            arguments.callee.last = now;
     }
}
}}}
